name: Spotlightr
author: Spotlightr

sections.description:
Upload, encrypt and publish your videos, use your own branding, and host your files wherever you like.

With the only video host that supports your courses, your marketing funnels, and your budget.

Preview images are automatically generated for the materials added to our hosting. They are pulled up remotely to the plugin page to make it easier for you to navigate your media materials.

Also, the script remotely connects to the pages where the video was embedded with this plugin. This script is required for communicating messages between the player and the webpage the player is on. For example, page is informed when the video is finished or page lets the player know who is watching the video and in what context.

By installing the plugin, you agree to the terms of use of the resource Spotlightr.com. Privacy URI: https://spotlightr.com/privacy.
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin if I donâ€™t have a Spotlightr account?

No, you must be a Spotlightr customer. You can sign up for a free trial, no credit card required, on https://projects.spotlightr.com/auth/register/.

Is your plugin required to use Spotlightr with WordPress?

No, the plugin is not a requirement. It allows for some features to be available inside the WordPress dashboard as well as some other fuctions. Please see https://docs.spotlightr.com/en/articles/3362389-wordpress-plugin-tutorial) for more info.

How do I get support?

We do not monitor the support forum here on this listing. Please contact us via live chat inside the Spotlightr dashboard or via email at support@spotlightr.com.

short_description: Video for Small Businesses & Big Ideas
description:
Upload, encrypt and publish your videos, use your own branding, and host your files wherever you like.

With the only video host that supports your courses, your marketing funnels, and your budget.

Preview images are automatically generated for the materials added to our hosting. They are pulled up remotely to the plugin page to make it easier for you to navigate your media materials.

Also, the script remotely connects to the pages where the video was embedded with this plugin. This script is required for communicating messages between the player and the webpage the player is on. For example, page is informed when the video is finished or page lets the player know who is watching the video and in what context.

screenshots.caption: You may upload new videos via the plugin from your computer, using external links, or from your media library
Block elements allow you to quickly find, and publish your videos.
You can configure various settings for publishing your videos, depending on the context.
